briefdescription.para: Initialization function for the ssd1306 device driver.

simplesect.para: If all operations completed sucessfully SL_STATUS_OK is returned. On failure a different status code is returned specifying the error.

briefdescription.para: Draw total of rows to SSD1306.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the pixel matrix buffer to draw. The format of the buffer depends on the color mode of SSD1306.

simplesect.para: SL_STATUS_OK if there are no errors.
Pointer to a SSD1306 structure or NULL if no SSD1306 is initialized yet.

briefdescription.para: Set a inversion color to SSD1306.

simplesect.para: SL_STATUS_OK if there are no errors.

briefdescription.para: Set a normal color to SSD1306.

simplesect.para: SL_STATUS_OK if there are no errors.

parameterdescription.para: value to set contrast. Select 1 out of 256 contrast steps. Contrast increases as the value increases

simplesect.para: SL_STATUS_OK if there are no errors.

briefdescription.para: Set a Right Horizontal Scroll to SSD1306.

simplesect.para: SL_STATUS_OK if there are no errors.

briefdescription.para: Set a Left Horizontal Scroll to SSD1306.

simplesect.para: SL_STATUS_OK if there are no errors.

briefdescription.para: Set a Vertical and Right Horizontal Scroll to SSD1306.

simplesect.para: SL_STATUS_OK if there are no errors.

briefdescription.para: Set a Vertical and Left Horizontal Scroll to SSD1306.

simplesect.para: SL_STATUS_OK if there are no errors.
SL_STATUS_OK if there are no errors.
SL_STATUS_OK if there are no errors.

sect1.title: Evaluation Quality
sect1.para: This code has been minimally tested to ensure that it builds and is suitable as a demonstration for evaluation purposes only. This code will be maintained at the sole discretion of Silicon Labs.
